code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddressList=()=>{const[addresses,setAddresses]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchAddresses(){try{const response=await axios.get("https://my-delivery-system.onrender.com/api/addresses");setAddresses(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching addresses:',error);}}fetchAddresses();},[]);const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await axios.delete("https://my-delivery-system.onrender.com/api/addresses/".concat(id));setAddresses(addresses.filter(address=>address.id!==id));}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting address:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"my-4",children:"Lista de Endere\xE7os"}),addresses.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:addresses.map(address=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"list-group-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:address.lot}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/edit/".concat(address.id),className:"btn btn-sm btn-warning me-2",children:"Editar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(address.id),className:"btn btn-sm btn-danger",children:"Excluir"})]})]})},address.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Nenhum endere\xE7o encontrado."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/create",className:"btn btn-primary mt-3",children:"Cadastrar Novo Endere\xE7o"})]});};export default AddressList;
